verses.verse: They took their journey<WH5265> from Elim,<WH362> and all the congregation<WH5712> of the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> came<WH935> to the wilderness<WH4057> of Sin,<WH5512> which is between Elim<WH362> and Sinai,<WH5514> on the fifteenth<WH2568> day<WH3117> of the second<WH8145> month<WH2320> after their departing out<WH3318> of the land<WH776> of Egypt.<WH4714>
The whole congregation<WH5712> of the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> murmured<WH3885> against Moses<WH4872> and against Aaron<WH175> in the wilderness;<WH4057>

and the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> said<WH559> to them,<WH4310> "We wish that we had died<WH4191> by the hand<WH3027> of Yahweh<WH3068> in the land<WH776> of Egypt,<WH4714> when we sat<WH3427> by the meat<WH1320> pots,<WH5518> when we ate<WH398> our fill<WH7648> of bread,<WH3899> for you have brought us out<WH3318> into this wilderness,<WH4057> to kill<WH4191> this whole assembly<WH6951> with hunger.<WH7458>"

Then Yahweh<WH3068> said<WH559> to Moses,<WH4872> "Behold,<WH4305> I will rain bread<WH3899> from the sky<WH8064> for you,<WH5971> and the people shall go out<WH3318> and gather<WH3950> a day<WH1697>'s portion every day,<WH3117> that I may test<WH5254> them,<WH3212> whether they will walk in my law,<WH8451> or not.

It shall come to pass on the sixth<WH8345> day,<WH3117> that they shall prepare<WH3559> that which<WH834> they bring in,<WH935> and it shall be twice<WH4932> as much as they gather<WH3950> daily.<WH3117>"

Moses<WH4872> and Aaron<WH175> said<WH559> to all the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> "At evening,<WH6153> then you shall know<WH3045> that Yahweh<WH3068> has brought you out<WH3318> from the land<WH776> of Egypt;<WH4714>

and in the morning,<WH1242> then you shall see<WH7200> the glory<WH3519> of Yahweh;<WH3068> because he hears<WH8085> your murmurings<WH8519> against Yahweh.<WH3068> Who are we,<WH5168> that you murmur against us?<WH3885>"

Moses<WH4872> said,<WH559> "Now Yahweh<WH3068> shall give<WH5414> you meat<WH1320> to eat<WH398> in the evening,<WH6153> and in the morning<WH1242> bread<WH3899> to satisfy<WH7646> you;<WH3068> because Yahweh hears<WH8085> your murmurings<WH8519> which you murmur<WH3885> against him.<WH5168> And who are we? Your murmurings<WH8519> are not against us,<WH3068> but against Yahweh."

Moses<WH4872> said<WH559> to Aaron,<WH175> "Tell<WH559> all the congregation<WH5712> of the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> <WH7126> 'Come near before<WH6440> Yahweh,<WH3068> for he has heard<WH8085> your murmurings.<WH8519>'"

It happened,<WH175> as Aaron spoke<WH1696> to the whole congregation<WH5712> of the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> that they looked<WH6437> toward the wilderness,<WH4057> and behold,<WH3519> the glory of Yahweh<WH3068> appeared<WH7200> in the cloud.<WH6051>
Yahweh<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> to Moses,<WH4872> saying,<WH559>

"I have heard<WH8085> the murmurings<WH8519> of the children<WH1121> of Israel.<WH3478> Speak<WH1696> to them,<WH559> saying, <WH996> 'At evening you shall eat<WH398> meat,<WH1320> and in the morning<WH1242> you shall be filled<WH7646> with bread:<WH3899> and you shall know<WH3045> that I am Yahweh<WH3068> your God.<WH430>'"
It happened at evening<WH6153> that quail<WH7958> came up<WH5927> and covered<WH3680> the camp;<WH4264> and in the morning<WH1242> the dew<WH2919> lay<WH7902> around<WH5439> the camp.<WH4264>

When the dew<WH2919> that lay<WH7902> had gone,<WH5927> behold,<WH6440> on the surface of the wilderness<WH4057> was a small<WH1851> round thing,<WH2636> small<WH1851> as the frost<WH3713> on the ground.<WH776>

When the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> saw<WH7200> it,<WH559> they said one<WH376> to another,<WH251> "What is it?<WH4478>" For they didn't<WH3045> know what it was.<WH4872> Moses said<WH559> to them,<WH3899> "It is the bread which Yahweh<WH3068> has given<WH5414> you to eat.<WH402>"

This is the thing<WH1697> which<WH834> Yahweh<WH3068> has commanded:<WH6680> "Gather<WH3950> of it everyone<WH376> according<WH6310> to his eating;<WH400> an omer<WH6016> a head,<WH1538> according to the number<WH4557> of your persons,<WH5315> you shall take<WH3947> it,<WH376> every man for those who are in his tent.<WH168>"
The children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> did<WH6213> so,<WH3950> and gathered some more,<WH7235> some less.<WH4591>

When they measured<WH4058> it with an omer,<WH6016> he who gathered much<WH7235> had nothing over,<WH5736> and he who gathered little<WH4591> had no lack.<WH2637> They gathered<WH3950> every man<WH376> according<WH6310> to his eating.<WH400>
Moses<WH4872> said<WH559> to them,<WH376> "Let no one leave<WH3498> of it until the morning.<WH1242>"

Notwithstanding they didn't<WH8085> listen to Moses,<WH4872> but some<WH582> of them left<WH3498> of it until the morning,<WH1242> and it bred<WH7311> worms,<WH8438> and became foul:<WH887> and Moses<WH4872> was angry with them.<WH7107>
They gathered<WH3950> it morning by morning,<WH1242> everyone<WH376> according<WH6310> to his eating.<WH400> When the sun<WH8121> grew hot,<WH2552> it melted.<WH4549>

It happened that on the sixth<WH8345> day<WH3117> they gathered<WH3950> twice<WH4932> as much bread,<WH3899> two<WH8147> omers<WH6016> for each one,<WH259> and all the rulers<WH5387> of the congregation<WH5712> came<WH935> and told<WH5046> Moses.<WH4872>

He said<WH559> to them,<WH3068> "This is that which Yahweh has spoken,<WH1696> <WH4279> 'Tomorrow is a solemn rest,<WH7677> a holy<WH6944> Sabbath<WH7676> to Yahweh.<WH3068> Bake<WH644> that which you want to bake,<WH644> and boil<WH1310> that which you want to boil;<WH1310> and all that<WH3605> remains over<WH5736> lay up<WH3240> for yourselves to be kept<WH4931> until the morning.<WH1242>'"
They laid it up<WH3240> until the morning,<WH1242> as Moses<WH4872> asked,<WH6680> and it didn't<WH887> become foul, neither was there any worm in it.<WH7415>
Moses<WH4872> said,<WH559> "Eat<WH398> that today,<WH3117> for today<WH3117> is a Sabbath<WH7676> to Yahweh.<WH3068> Today<WH3117> you shall not find<WH4672> it in the field.<WH7704>
Six<WH8337> days<WH3117> you shall gather<WH3950> it,<WH7637> but on the seventh day<WH3117> is the Sabbath.<WH7676> In it there shall be none."
It happened on the seventh<WH7637> day,<WH3117> that some of the people<WH5971> went out<WH3318> to gather,<WH3950> and they found none.<WH4672>
Yahweh<WH3068> said<WH559> to Moses,<WH4872> "How long do you refuse<WH3985> to keep<WH8104> my commandments<WH4687> and my laws?<WH8451>

Behold,<WH7200> because Yahweh<WH3068> has given<WH5414> you the Sabbath,<WH7676> therefore he gives<WH5414> you on the sixth<WH8345> day<WH3117> the bread<WH3899> of two days.<WH3117> Everyone<WH376> stay<WH3427> in his place.<WH376> Let no one go out<WH3318> of his place<WH4725> on the seventh<WH7637> day.<WH3117>"
So the people<WH5971> rested<WH7673> on the seventh<WH7637> day.<WH3117>

The house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478> called<WH7121> its name<WH8034> Manna,<WH4478> and it was like coriander<WH1407> seed,<WH2233> white;<WH3836> and its taste<WH2940> was like wafers<WH6838> with honey.<WH1706>

Moses<WH4872> said,<WH559> "This is the thing<WH1697> which Yahweh<WH3068> has commanded,<WH6680> <WH4393> 'Let an omer-full<WH6016> of it be kept<WH4931> throughout your generations,<WH1755> that they may see<WH7200> the bread<WH3899> with which I fed<WH398> you in the wilderness,<WH4057> when I brought you forth<WH3318> from the land<WH776> of Egypt.<WH4714>'"

Moses<WH4872> said<WH559> to Aaron,<WH175> "Take<WH3947> a<WH259> pot,<WH6803> and put<WH5414> an omer-full<WH6016> of<WH4393> manna<WH4478> in it,<WH3240> and lay it up before<WH6440> Yahweh,<WH3068> to be kept<WH4931> throughout your generations.<WH1755>"
As Yahweh<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> Moses,<WH4872> so Aaron<WH175> laid it up<WH3240> before<WH6440> the Testimony,<WH5715> to be kept.<WH4931>

The children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> ate<WH398> the manna<WH4478> forty<WH705> years,<WH8141> until they came<WH935> to an inhabited<WH3427> land.<WH776> They ate<WH398> the manna<WH4478> until they came<WH935> to the borders<WH7097> of the land<WH776> of Canaan.<WH3667>
Now an omer<WH6016> is the tenth<WH6224> part of an ephah.<WH374>
